title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 11 September 2008 - XWiki
content:

sdumitriu - (11/09/2008 11:52): Hi mflorea  
mflorea - (11/09/2008 11:53): Hi sdumitriu  
sdumitriu - (11/09/2008 11:54): mouseleave \_should\_ be triggered when the dialog appears  
mflorea - (11/09/2008 11:54): :( it isn't  
sdumitriu - (11/09/2008 11:55): Then you could unhover on mouseclick  
mflorea - (11/09/2008 11:56): this is not right because if the dialog doesn't hide the button then after click the button should remain hovering  
mflorea - (11/09/2008 11:56): because the mouse remains over the button  
sdumitriu - (11/09/2008 12:11): mflorea: I just tried, and when another element appears over a hovered div, then onmousout is executed  
sdumitriu - (11/09/2008 12:11): (In FF3)  
mflorea - (11/09/2008 12:12): sdumitriu: FF2 seems to behave differently.. though I remember I had the same problem this morning at home with FF3..  
sdumitriu - (11/09/2008 12:13): Let me try with FF2  
sdumitriu - (11/09/2008 12:13): Tha same with FF2  
mflorea - (11/09/2008 12:15): hmm.. In my case mouseout is not triggered. Let me try this outside GWT  
sdumitriu - (11/09/2008 12:15): In opera mouseout is triggered not right after the other element appears, but as soon as the mouse is moved  
mflorea - (11/09/2008 12:45): sdumitriu: I can't reproduce it outside gwt so it seems to be a gwt problem. I'll debug it
